value.title: Set Up Power BI Data Gateway to Connect On-Premise Data Sources
value.excerpt: During this session, we will be discussing about how we can install Standard Data Gateway to connect with On-Premise Data sources like SQL Server. value.title: 3 steps to do an IT Admin Takeover for Power BI and Office 365
value.excerpt: In this video, I revisit how to perform an IT Admin takeover for your tenant. This could just be a tenant that you did an individual sign up for Power BI with.  I walk through the 3 main steps to perform the takeover. Doing the takeover doesn't cost you anything. For more detail on the cost of Power

value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway
value.excerpt: This video was based on a call I had last week relating to troubleshooting connectivity to a SQL Server named instance from the Power BI gateway.
